uk.knightz.knightzapi.communication.rsa

Class RSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.knightz.knightzapi.communication.rsa.RSA

  • public class RSA
extends Object
    Static RSA utility methods for encrypting and decrypting blocks of information. Uses RSA.Holder for holding AES and RSA keys in a single object

                             PrivateKey key)

        Parameters:
        byteCipherText - The data to be sent
        encryptedKey - The encrypted AES key used
